IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_id') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_id GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_id @nickname NVARCHAR(10) AS SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @character_id dbo.id_t SELECT @character_id = id FROM dbo.Characters where nickname = @nickname SET @character_id = ISNULL(@character_id, 0)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
RETURN (@character_id)
